itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Mud Crystals found near Glish Ruins.

item.name: Rough Mud Crystal
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Mud Crystal requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered near the Glish Ruins.

item.name: Steel Taritas Helmet
item.desc: Steel Taritas Helmet made by master blacksmith\nIt is lighter and more durable than normal one. It can also be used for durability restoration of normal Taritas Helmet.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Steel Taritas Armor
item.desc: Steel Taritas Armor made by master blacksmith\nIt is lighter and more durable than normal one. It can also be used for durability restoration of normal Taritas Armor.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Steel Taritas Shoes
item.desc: Steel Taritas Shoes made by master blacksmith\nIt is lighter and more durable than normal one. It can also be used for durability restoration of normal Taritas Shoes.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Ultimate Steel Taritas Shoes
item.desc:
Steel Taritas Shoes with maximum potential.
Lighter than ordinary Ultimate Taritas shoes, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : All Taritas and Steel Taritas Shoes

item.name: Mud Crystal Amulet of Curses
item.desc: An accessory made by Processing a Mud Crystal. Those wanting a curse to befall someone else carry around this as a charm.
